aboutPage.title: Comtehno
aboutPage.text: - This is a modern educational institution where students receive quality education and skills that are in demand in the labor market.
aboutPage.missionContent: We prepare professionals who combine knowledge with practice. In our case, theory is always backed by real experience: students participate in projects, internships, and solving current problems.
aboutPage.valuesContent: Our values are professionalism, innovation, responsibility, and a commitment to knowledge. We believe that only through honesty and teamwork can high results be achieved in education and career.
aboutPage.visionContent: We strive to create an educational environment in which every student can develop and apply knowledge in practice. Our graduates become professionals ready to meet the challenges of the modern world.
